Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about our research, collaboration, and services.

How can I collaborate with TracerBody on research?

We welcome collaboration with security researchers, academic institutions, and organizations. Please contact us with details about your research interests and how you'd like to collaborate. We're particularly interested in joint research projects, data sharing, and tool development.

Can I request custom datasets for my research?

Yes, we can create custom sanitized datasets for legitimate research purposes. Please provide details about your research objectives, required data characteristics, and intended use. Custom dataset requests are evaluated on a case-by-case basis.

How do I report a security vulnerability?

Please use our Responsible Disclosure process for reporting security vulnerabilities. Send reports to security@tracerbody.org with detailed information about the vulnerability, affected systems, and potential impact.

Are your tools and datasets free to use?

Most of our tools and datasets are available under open-source licenses for research and educational purposes. Each resource includes specific licensing information. Commercial use may require separate licensing agreements.

TracerBody

Advancing cybersecurity through responsible research, breach awareness, and ethical data disclosure practices.
